column3: “Purps and citrus make a great combo...I wanted to experience the deep somatic experience I've heard this strain provides. I found that Grape Soda provides similar benefits to its predecessor, Tahoe OG. Because of its dominant somatic effects, I wouldn't recommend this strain for physically strenuous activities. However, Grape Soda is an excellent strain for relaxing the body before reading, stretching, beginner yoga,...”

“Outstanding body to this beautiful and tasty bud. I'm no lightweight, and Grape Soda was a wonderfully balanced combination of solid upper body stone and elevated mood. Definitely indica-leaning, this 30% THC version of the strain had me chatty, relaxed,, functional, if perhaps somewhat slower than usual, and very, very happy to be doing whatever I was doing, wherever I was doing it. An outstanding strain for treatin...”

“I have to hand it to Taste Budz; they grew some amazing weed with the batch of Grape Soda I bought at Beaver Bowls. THC percentage was just above 30%, so it was ridiculous strong. Smelled great - sweet, earthy and grapey. As for the taste, I got an earthy, grapey vibe, but I smoked it out of a spoon pipe so the taste was faint. For my part, I usually get better flavor out of a joint.

After a couple of minutes, the h...”

“Really enjoyed smoking and taking rips out of this strain. Would recommend to heavy stoners who love to buzz for a good while. Have only tried it once and the feeling was AMAZING! Also boys this strain makes you arroused and kinda horny so be ready!”

“First bong rip and it had my floating🔥 great taste, the leaves are a mix of purple and dark green beautiful🙌🏻 Music sounds amazing and your phone is like a movie. I recommend if you see this near you cop ASAP.”
“Very strong strain.   It's smooth  yet strong. This would be good for pain.   I enjoyed this.  You don't need a lot to get relief.”
“Great flavor Great Potency good afternoon strain 🔥🚀💯”
“bro. this strain is amazing. i’m so relaxed and giggly. it’s so calming and smells amazing. highly recommend :))”
“Very relaxing herb, good taste, made me feel happy”
“Moderate pain relief.  Decent sleep.  I did feel like laughing, which isn't normal.”
“This bud is really good! Perfect for night time”
“It taste so good. It got me relaxed and talking like crazy lol ❤️”
“Very mellow.  Takes the edge off and helps you relax.”
